description:
A residential development comprising the conversion of Bromyard House and roof addition to form 564 residential units (70 x studio apartments, 224 X 1 bed apartments, 194 x 2 bed apartments, 76 x 3 bed apartments) and 15 live work units; the erection of three 3 storey buildings forming 27 residential units (27 x 2 bed apartments), the erection of a three storey building forming 21 residential units (21 x 3 bed apartments); served by 380 parking spaces at basement and surface level; landscaping and associated works
 "Note: A key difference between this proposal and the previously approved scheme (which is currently under construction), is that it results in 86 additonal apartments at the site, mainly through the replacement of vacant office space within the southern part of Bromyard House.  No change is proposed to the approved 3 storey building fronting Third Avenue (New Duplicate Application Received)
